name: k6-api-testing-framework
description: A comprehensive, dockerized K6 framework for functional and load testing of REST APIs.

scripts.docker:build: npm run generate:payloads && docker-compose -f docker/docker-compose.yaml build
scripts.test:petstore:crud: npm run generate:payloads && K6_SCRIPT_NAME=scripts/petstore/crud.js API_TARGET=petstore docker-compose -f docker/docker-compose.yaml run --rm k6 run scripts/petstore/crud.js --out json=- | node tools/format-results.js
